actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management Discharged.
Reported by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 110-676.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 229.
Ms. Johnson, E. B. moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Con. Res. 335.
On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.
Senate Committee on Rules and Administration discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management

official_title: Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds for a celebration of the 100th anniversary of Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Incorporated.

summary.text: Permits the Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Inc. to sponsor a free public event on the Capitol grounds on July 17, 2008, to celebrate the 100th anniversary of Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Inc.

titles.title: Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds for a celebration of the 100th anniversary of Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Incorporated.
